title: Taproot Lounge & Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, International, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Fusion, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. A modern American, from-scratch bar, restaurant and entertainment venue featuring tapas, bowls, fusion and comfort style cuisine, fresh pressed juices and smoothies, vegan desserts, organic coffee and espresso. Open late every  night. Vegan items marked on the menu. Dipping sauces are vegan. Staff is  knowledgeable of what vegan and gluten-free means. Many items that are not listed as vegan can be modified as such. Full bar featuring many local spirits, wines and all local beers. Happy hour from 3-6. 
Supports local farms and local businesses. Provides an additional outlet for musicians and artists to perform and display talents.
